welcomeDescription1: This is a website to count the days you and your loved one have been together. It helps you celebrate your relationship milestones and cherish the moments you've shared. Whether it's been a few days, months, or years, Infinity Love is here to help you keep track of your journey together.
welcomeDescription2: Infinity Love is more than just a date counter. It's a celebration of your unique love story. With its beautiful design and user-friendly interface, you can easily track and share your relationship milestones with your partner.
enterDate: Enter the date you start the relationship
aboutDescription: Infinity Love was created with love and attention to detail. We believe that every relationship is unique and deserves to be celebrated. Our website is designed to be user-friendly and visually appealing, making it easy for you to keep track of your love story.
ourTeamDescription: We are a small team of developers and designers dedicated to creating the best possible experience for our users. We are constantly working to improve Infinity Love and add new features that you will love.
contactDescription: If you have any questions, suggestions, or feedback, please don't hesitate to contact us. We would love to hear from you!
